name: webdev-starter
description: Boilerplate for webpack-based sites or apps
author: Nikolay Rademacher

scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && yarn build:tailwind && yarn minify:css && webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.lint: if [ -f .eslintrc.* ]; then eslint . --fix; else yarn setup:eslint && eslint . --fix; fi
scripts.build:tailwind: if [ -f tailwind.source.css ]; then postcss tailwind.source.css -o src/style.css; fi
scripts.clean:build: if test -d 'dist/'; then rm -r dist/; fi
scripts.setup:react: yarn add react react-dom && yarn add -D @babel/preset-react && if [ ! -f babel.config.json ]; then echo '{ "presets": ["@babel/preset-react"] }' > babel.config.json; fi
scripts.setup:eslint: yarn add -D eslint && eslint --init && if test -f "package-lock.json"; then rm package-lock.json && yarn; fi
